Package cycling

Class CyclingPortalImpl

java.lang.Object
cycling.CyclingPortalImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CyclingPortal, MiniCyclingPortal, Serializable
public class CyclingPortalImpl extends Object implements CyclingPortal
CyclingPortal is a fully compiling, functioning implementor of the CyclingPortal interface.

    • createRace

      public int createRace(String name, String description) throws IllegalNameException, InvalidNameException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      The method creates a staged race in the platform with the given name and description.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      createRace in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      name - Race's name.
      description - Race's description (can be null).
      Returns:
      the unique ID of the created race.
      Throws:
      IllegalNameException - If the name already exists in the platform.
      InvalidNameException - If the name is null, empty, has more than 30 characters, or has white spaces.

    • viewRaceDetails

      public String viewRaceDetails(int raceId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      Get the details from a race.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      viewRaceDetails in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
      Returns:
      Any formatted string containing the race ID, name, description, the number of stages, and the total length (i.e., the sum of all stages' length).
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any race in the system.

    • addStageToRace

      public int addStageToRace(int raceId, String stageName, String description, double length, LocalDateTime startTime, StageType type) throws IDNotRecognisedException, IllegalNameException, InvalidNameException, InvalidLengthException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      Creates a new stage and adds it to the race.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      addStageToRace in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      raceId - The race which the stage will be added to.
      stageName - An identifier name for the stage.
      description - A descriptive text for the stage.
      length - Stage length in kilometres.
      startTime - The date and time in which the stage will be raced. It cannot be null.
      type - The type of the stage. This is used to determine the amount of points given to the winner.
      Returns:
      the unique ID of the stage.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any race in the system.
      IllegalNameException - If the name already exists in the platform.
      InvalidNameException - If the name is null, empty, has more than 30 characters, or has white spaces.
      InvalidLengthException - If the length is less than 5km.

    • getRaceStages

      public int[] getRaceStages(int raceId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getRaceStages in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
      Returns:
      An array of stage IDs ordered (from first to last) by their sequence in the race or an empty array if none exists.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any race in the system.

    • addCategorizedClimbToStage

      public int addCategorizedClimbToStage(int stageId, Double location, CheckpointType type, Double averageGradient, Double length) throws IDNotRecognisedException, InvalidLocationException, InvalidStageStateException, InvalidStageTypeException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      Adds a climb checkpoint to a stage.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      addCategorizedClimbToStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage to which the climb checkpoint is being added.
      location - The kilometre location where the climb finishes within the stage.
      type - The category of the climb - CheckpointType.C4, CheckpointType.C3, CheckpointType.C2, CheckpointType.C1, or CheckpointType.HC.
      averageGradient - The average gradient for the climb.
      length - The length of the climb in kilometre.
      Returns:
      The ID of the checkpoint created.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any stage in the system.
      InvalidLocationException - If the location is out of bounds of the stage length.
      InvalidStageStateException - If the stage is "waiting for results".
      InvalidStageTypeException - Time-trial stages cannot contain any checkpoint.

    • addIntermediateSprintToStage

      public int addIntermediateSprintToStage(int stageId, double location) throws IDNotRecognisedException, InvalidLocationException, InvalidStageStateException, InvalidStageTypeException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:

      location - The kilometre location where the interme-diate sprint finishes within the stage.
      Returns:
      The ID of the checkpoint created.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any stage in the system.
      InvalidLocationException - If the location is out of bounds of the stage length.
      InvalidStageStateException - If the stage is "waiting for results".
      InvalidStageTypeException - Time-trial stages cannot contain any checkpoint.

    • removeRider

      public void removeRider(int riderId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Throws:

    • registerRiderResultsInStage

      public void registerRiderResultsInStage(int stageId, int riderId, LocalTime... checkpoints) throws IDNotRecognisedException, DuplicatedResultException, InvalidCheckpointTimesException, InvalidStageStateException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      Record the times of a rider in a stage.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      registerRiderResultsInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage the result refers to.
      riderId - The ID of the rider.
      checkpoints - An array of times at which the rider reached each of the checkpoints of the stage, including the start time and the finish line.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any rider or stage in the system.
      DuplicatedResultException - Thrown if the rider has already a result for the stage. Each rider can have only one result per stage.
      InvalidCheckpointTimesException - Thrown if the length of checkpointTimes is not equal to n+2, where n is the number of checkpoints in the stage; +2 represents the start time and the finish time of the stage.
      InvalidStageStateException - Thrown if the stage is not "waiting for results". Results can only be added to a stage while it is "waiting for results".

    • getRiderResultsInStage

      public LocalTime[] getRiderResultsInStage(int stageId, int riderId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      Get the times of a rider in a stage.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getRiderResultsInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage the result refers to.
      riderId - The ID of the rider.
      Returns:
      The array of times at which the rider reached each of the checkpoints of the stage and the total elapsed time. The elapsed time is the difference between the finish time and the start time. Return an empty array if there is no result registered for the rider in the stage. Assume the total elapsed time of a stage never exceeds 24h and, therefore, can be represented by a LocalTime variable. There is no need to check for this condition or raise any exception.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any rider or stage in the system.

    • getRiderAdjustedElapsedTimeInStage

      public LocalTime getRiderAdjustedElapsedTimeInStage(int stageId, int riderId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      For the general classification, the aggregated time is based on the adjusted elapsed time, not the real elapsed time. Adjustments are made to take into account groups of riders finishing very close together, e.g., the peloton. If a rider has a finishing time less than one second slower than the previous rider, then their adjusted elapsed time is the smallest of both. For instance, a stage with 200 riders finishing "together" (i.e., less than 1 second between consecutive riders), the adjusted elapsed time of all riders should be the same as the first of all these riders, even if the real gap between the 200th and the 1st rider is much bigger than 1 second. There is no adjustments on elapsed time on time-trials.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getRiderAdjustedElapsedTimeInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage the result refers to.
      riderId - The ID of the rider.
      Returns:
      The adjusted elapsed time for the rider in the stage. Return null if there is no result registered for the rider in the stage.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any rider or stage in the system.

    • deleteRiderResultsInStage

      public void deleteRiderResultsInStage(int stageId, int riderId) throws IDNotRecognisedException

    • getRidersRankInStage

      public int[] getRidersRankInStage(int stageId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      Get the riders finished position in a a stage.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getRidersRankInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal

    • getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage

      public LocalTime[] getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage(int stageId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      Get the adjusted elapsed times of riders in a stage.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage being queried.
      Returns:
      The ranked list of adjusted elapsed times sorted by their finish time. An empty list if there is no result for the stage. These times should match the riders returned by MiniCyclingPortal.getRidersRankInStage(int). Assume the total elapsed time of in a stage never exceeds 24h and, therefore, can be represented by a LocalTime variable. There is no need to check for this condition or raise any exception.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any stage in the system.

    • getRidersPointsInStage

      public int[] getRidersPointsInStage(int stageId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      Get the number of points obtained by each rider in a stage.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getRidersPointsInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage being queried.
      Returns:
      The ranked list of points each riders received in the stage, sorted by their elapsed time. An empty list if there is no result for the stage. These points should match the riders returned by MiniCyclingPortal.getRidersRankInStage(int).
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any stage in the system.

    • getRidersMountainPointsInStage

      public int[] getRidersMountainPointsInStage(int stageId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      Get the number of mountain points obtained by each rider in a stage.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getRidersMountainPointsInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage being queried.
      Returns:
      The ranked list of mountain points each riders received in the stage, sorted by their finish time. An empty list if there is no result for the stage. These points should match the riders returned by MiniCyclingPortal.getRidersRankInStage(int).
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any stage in the system.

    • saveCyclingPortal

      public void saveCyclingPortal(String filename) throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      Method saves this MiniCyclingPortal contents into a serialised file, with the filename given in the argument.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      saveCyclingPortal in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      filename - Location of the file to be saved.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is a problem experienced when trying to save the store contents to the file.

    • loadCyclingPortal

      public void loadCyclingPortal(String filename) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: MiniCyclingPortal
      Method should load and replace this MiniCyclingPortal contents with the serialised contents stored in the file given in the argument.

      The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      loadCyclingPortal in interface MiniCyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      filename - Location of the file to be loaded.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is a problem experienced when trying to load the store contents from the file.
      ClassNotFoundException - If required class files cannot be found when loading.

    • removeRaceByName

      public void removeRaceByName(String name) throws NameNotRecognisedException

      The state of this CyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      removeRaceByName in interface CyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the race to be removed.
      Throws:
      NameNotRecognisedException - If the name does not match to any race in the system.

    • getGeneralClassificationTimesInRace

      public LocalTime[] getGeneralClassificationTimesInRace(int raceId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: CyclingPortal
      Get the general classification times of riders in a race.

      The state of this CyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getGeneralClassificationTimesInRace in interface CyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
      Returns:
      A list of riders' times sorted by the sum of their adjusted elapsed times in all stages of the race. An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race. These times should match the riders returned by CyclingPortal.getRidersGeneralClassificationRank(int). Assume the total elapsed time of a race (the sum of all of its stages) never exceeds 24han be represented by and, therefore, c a LocalTime variable. There is no need to check for this condition or raise any exception.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

    • getRidersPointsInRace

      public int[] getRidersPointsInRace(int raceId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: CyclingPortal
      Get the overall points of riders in a race.

      The state of this CyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getRidersPointsInRace in interface CyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
      Returns:
      An array of riders' points (i.e., the sum of their points in all stages of the race), sorted by the total adjusted elapsed time. An empty array if there is no result for any stage in the race. These points should match the riders returned by CyclingPortal.getRidersGeneralClassificationRank(int).
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

    • getRidersMountainPointsInRace

      public int[] getRidersMountainPointsInRace(int raceId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: CyclingPortal
      Get the overall mountain points of riders in a race.

      The state of this CyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getRidersMountainPointsInRace in interface CyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
      Returns:
      An array of riders' mountain points (i.e., the sum of their mountain points in all stages of the race), sorted by the total adjusted elapsed time. An empty array if there is no result for any stage in the race. These points should match the riders returned by CyclingPortal.getRidersGeneralClassificationRank(int).
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

    • getRidersGeneralClassificationRank

      public int[] getRidersGeneralClassificationRank(int raceId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: CyclingPortal
      Get the general classification rank of riders in a race.

      The state of this CyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getRidersGeneralClassificationRank in interface CyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
      Returns:
      A ranked list of riders' IDs sorted ascending by the sum of their adjusted elapsed times in all stages of the race. That is, the first in this list is the winner (least time). An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

    • getRidersPointClassificationRank

      public int[] getRidersPointClassificationRank(int raceId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: CyclingPortal
      Get the ranked list of riders based on the points classification in a race.

      The state of this CyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getRidersPointClassificationRank in interface CyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
      Returns:
      A ranked list of riders' IDs sorted descending by the sum of their points in all stages of the race. That is, the first in this list is the winner (more points). An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

    • getRidersMountainPointClassificationRank

      public int[] getRidersMountainPointClassificationRank(int raceId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: CyclingPortal
      Get the ranked list of riders based on the mountain classification in a race.

      The state of this CyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      getRidersMountainPointClassificationRank in interface CyclingPortal
      Parameters:
      raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
      Returns:
      A ranked list of riders' IDs sorted descending by the sum of their mountain points in all stages of the race. That is, the first in this list is the winner (more points). An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.
